text:
http://www.resolver.com/ | Toronto, Canada | ONSITE | Full-time

Looking for Javascript developers. Various levels.

Front end: React / Redux / Babel Back end: Node / Postgres / Redis

Office is near Union Station so it's easy to reach from GO Train / Subway. Team is fun! Also you can store your bike in office.

Product is B2B so you've never heard of us, but it's a great place to work.

http://app.jobvite.com/m?3PuLjiwa
